original_title: Talk of the Town | Roshan Mahanama | The Citizens’ Duty of Care | 7 December 2023
original_body_lines: Talk of the Town | Roshan Mahanama | The Citizens' Duty of Care | 7 December 2023
Sajith wears a Palestinian scarf to parliament as a mark of solidarity for peace
Guidelines to be issued to government institutions on code of conduct
